text: hey greg i added that `exit_reboot` helped as suggested but the machine never moves to the next stage.
okay - so - it will reboot into that task again.  We usually test to see if dru tools say to reboot or not.
if not, we return success and the system continues.
That allows you to loop in the same task until done.
If you want to chain like that, you need to explicitly set the next stage before exiting reboot.
is there a helper for "next stage"?
Yeah, our flash code for messing with dru knows how to interpret the output from DRU (both exit code and log output) to do the right thing.
and our bios code for Dell boxes wraps omreport and omconfig to intelligently detect whether a reboot is needed.
